channel.title: [PI] NPC Hit Delays [REP]
channel.description: I'm using Mystic-Effect, and every NPC attacks very slowly, it's like 10 or more seconds between hits on me. PvP is fine its just PvM this happens. How would I go about fixing this? It makes killing boss monsters too easy..

item.title: [PI] NPC Hit Delays [REP]
item.dc:creator: @ClairtyX ClairtyX
item.description:
@ClairtyX wrote:

I’m using Mystic-Effect, and every NPC attacks very slowly, it’s like 10 or more seconds between hits on me. PvP is fine its just PvM this happens. How would I go about fixing this? It makes killing boss monsters too easy…
